mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (q_title, q_date, q_context, user_id) VALUES ('${q_title}', '${q_date}', '${q_context}', '${user_id}');
mapper.select: select * from question qq left join ( select count(*) as a_count, q.q_no from answer a left join question q on a.q_no = q.q_no group by q.q_no ) aa on qq.q_no = aa.q_no where qq.q_no = #{q_no}
mapper.update: update question set q_title = #{q_title}, q_context = #{q_context}, status = #{status} where q_no = #{q_no}
mapper.insert: insert into answer(q_no, a_context, a_date, user_id) values (#{q_no}, #{a_context}, date_format(now(), '%y-%m-%d %H : %i'), #{user_id})
